AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the United States District Court: Court responsible for making ends-of-justice findings on the record and for ruling on motions related to speedy trial determinations
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Raymond McMillon's brief: Document submitted by Raymond McMillon in support of his arguments
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Zeba Williams' live sentencing testimony: Testimony given by Zeba Williams during the sentencing hearing that contradicted Raymond McMillon's minor-role arguments
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the tractor-trailer: Vehicle used by Zeba Williams and accompanied by Raymond McMillon to transport undocumented aliens
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the \u00a7 3B1.2 adjustment: Adjustment requested by Raymond McMillon based on his claimed minor role in the offenses
